welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kato Polemidia, the charming city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Raf Akrotiri Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Raf Akrotiri Airport provides a more luxurious and private experience for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paphos International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
